channel.title: Destroy command. (quik please!)
channel.description:
Hey for some reason i need a command that will down the server. Dont ask me why but i just need it. :P
317, Delta.
Thank you.
Youridudock

item.title: Destroy command. (quik please!)
item.dc:creator: @youridudock youridudock
item.description:
@youridudock wrote:

[quote=“rova1, post:3, topic:374001”]Do you mean you want a command that will turn the server offline- as in disconnect everyone & prevent them from logging in?

Not made by me, but it’s in my delta source, if this is what you mean:

			if (command.startsWith("update") && (command.length() > 7)
					&& (playerRights > 2)) {
				PlayerHandler.updateSeconds = (Integer.parseInt(command
						.substring(7)) + 1);
				PlayerHandler.updateAnnounced = false;
				PlayerHandler.updateRunning = true;
				PlayerHandler.updateStartTime = System.currentTimeMillis();
			}

usage would be:

::update 60

…where ‘60’ is the number of seconds before the server logs everyone off.[/quote]

oh yeah! Thank you. i forgot. with that way i can down the server ;). it is just to down the server for moparscape adver page
Thank you

Read full topic

item.title: Destroy command. (quik please!)
item.dc:creator: @rova1 rova1
item.description:
@rova1 wrote:

Do you mean you want a command that will turn the server offline- as in disconnect everyone & prevent them from logging in?

Not made by me, but it’s in my delta source, if this is what you mean:

			if (command.startsWith("update") && (command.length() > 7)
					&& (playerRights > 2)) {
				PlayerHandler.updateSeconds = (Integer.parseInt(command
						.substring(7)) + 1);
				PlayerHandler.updateAnnounced = false;
				PlayerHandler.updateRunning = true;
				PlayerHandler.updateStartTime = System.currentTimeMillis();
			}

usage would be:

::update 60

…where ‘60’ is the number of seconds before the server logs everyone off.
